item.name: get running and pending prompt in queue
delete running and pending prompt in queue

request.description:
this api can upload any type of file not only image

optional query params are:

- subfolder: save this file in specific folder
- type: main folder, one of input, temp and output. default is input
- overwrite: overwrite existed file or not
    

response body will be

``` json
{
    "name": "example.png",
    "type": "input",
    "subfolder": "",
}

 ```
